title: Ep. 584 - The Tinfoil Hat-Trick
description:
Hillary peddles an election conspiracy theory, Biden wants Islam taught in schools, and the feds finally start arresting anarchists.

Ben's new book "How to Destroy America in Three Easy Steps" is coming out July 21st. Get your signed copy here => https://utm.io/uGvC
